title: Scottish Tory MPs claim Nicola Sturgeon leaflets will boost their voters' turnout in winter election
text:
Scottish Conservative MPs have prepared general election leaflets featuring pictures of Nicola Sturgeon as they are convinced her image will increase Tory voter turnout in the winter weather.

Several MPs told the Telegraph they intend to put the First Minister front and centre of their campaign material thanks to her unpopularity in the 13 seats they are defending.

They said it was much easier to get their target voters to polling stations by asking them to defeat "Nicola Sturgeon's candidate" than if the SNP was led by a less divisive figure.

As in the 2017 contest, the Tories are planning to fight a forthcoming election by promising Scots to "stop Nicola" and her plans for a second independence...
description: Scottish Conservative MPs have prepared general election leaflets featuring pictures of Nicola Sturgeon as they are convinced her image will increase Tory voter turnout in the winter weather.
